org.deeplearning4j.models.sequencevectors.transformers.impl

Class SentenceTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.models.sequencevectors.transformers.impl.SentenceTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Sequence<VocabWord>>, SequenceTransformer<VocabWord,java.lang.String>

    public class SentenceTransformer
extends java.lang.Object
implements SequenceTransformer<VocabWord,java.lang.String>, java.lang.Iterable<Sequence<VocabWord>>
    This simple class is responsible for conversion lines of text to Sequences of SequenceElements to fit them into SequenceVectors model

        public Sequence<VocabWord> transformToSequence(java.lang.String object)
        Description copied from interface: SequenceTransformer
        This is generic method for transformation data from any format to Sequence of SequenceElement. It will be used both in Vocab building, and in training process
